column3: News; Preah Vihear: Preah Vihear Police warned people living in border areas and old army locations should take precautions against high explosive munitions which can still be found in the ground.------On January 26
column7: a school student from Choam Ksan village lost 4 fingers and his right eye after an 80mm round exploded.Â The victim was taken to Chreang Ksan Referral Hospital.------Warning
